## hey there! ðŸ‘‹

I'm happy you've choosen to contribute to queizen30/lumt!

Here's what you need to do to sucessfully contribute to LUMT:

1. Choose what you want to contribute (Allowed: Blog article, new list, new cheetsheet, new item on LUMT, there might be more allowed, just contribute it and you will see if it will be accepted)

2. Create an Issue/PR 
    - ISSUE:
        - Issues are for small things like adding a new item to a list or a bug report
        - There are a few Issue templates, if none fits your needs you can:
            - A: Create a new template
            - B: Just write what you want to chanche/add (recommended)
    - PULL REQUESTS:
        - PRs are for big things like blog articles or chanching repo strucure
        - As of now, there are no PR templates

3. See if it will be accepted
